non-submitted.header: Want to check which games are already on the platform?

guidelines.disrespect: Be Respectful: treat other community members with respect and courtesy. Avoid personal attacks, harassment and discrimination towards others.
guidelines.irrelevant: Relevant Content: content shared in a review should be relevant to the gaming industry and its adjacent branches.
guidelines.piracy: Intellectual Property and Piracy: although you may mention and discuss piracy of games, you must avoid sharing links to unauthorized game files, cracks, or pirated content.
guidelines.privacy: Privacy and Personal Information: you must respect each other's privacy and not share personal information without consent.
guidelines.spam: No Spam or Self-Promotion: promoting other sites is purely prohibited and self-promoting is to be kept to a minimum.
guidelines.spoiler: No Spoilers: avoid posting spoilers without proper warnings, these must be stated in the title and the first few lines of the review should not contain spoiler.
guidelines.title: Community Guidelines

header.following: Reviews from people who you follow
header.recommended: Reviews we recommend based on your preferences
